data.title: Riddley Walker by Russell Hoban, Signed
data.meta_description: Riddley Walker: Expanded Edition by HOBAN, Russell and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Hard Cover. Condition: VG. Light soil to outer edges and light creasing from page handling. Actual book for sale pictured. Includes publisher's note and a Certificate of Authenticity signed by the author, a witness and the publisher. 14.8 x 22.5 x 3.3cm, wt850g One of the titles selected by Anthony Burgess for his book "99 Novels: The Best in English Since 1939". B4 nd u upon the berning bye bye hump u gotta reed this buk. Trubba not no kidda no Arga Warga! Size: 8vo - over 7¾" - 9¾" tall. Signed by Author.

Hardcover. Condition: As New. SIGNED by Russell Hoban. Comes with Easton's signed Certificate of Authenticity. I bought this signed Easton Press book and many others from a wealthy Easton Press subscriber. I've been buying books from him for years and his books are always unread and As New. Bound in full red leather with real gold decorations. Luxury features include gilded page edges, acid neutral paper that is sewn (not glued) into the binding, raised bands on the spine, moire endpapers, and a sewn-in leather bookmark. Ships same or next business day very well protected in a box. ; 8vo 8" - 9" tall; 235 pages; Signed by Author.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good+. No Jacket. First Edition Thus. First Easton Press edition, hardcover in full red leather with all edges gilt, and gold stamped decoration to the spine and covers. This special collector's edition is signed by Hoban on the limitation page, and is accompanied by the publisher's certificate of authenticity and notes sheet. The book has a shallow skew to the binding, and mild bumps to the spine ends. Otherwise, this is a solid, tight, clean Very Good+ copy.

Hardcover. Condition: Fine. 1st Edition. Easton Press. SIGNED. Red cloth with 4 raised spine bands on spine and decorations stamped in gilt on the front cover. Book accented in 22kt gold. Printed on archival paper with gilded edges. The end sheets are of moire fabric with a silk ribbon page marker. Smyth sewing and concealed muslin joints to ensure the highest quality binding. This book is in full leather with hubbed spines. Boldly signed by the author on a special dedication page tipped in by the publisher. There is a COA as well as an information card about the book loosely laid in. Absolutely gorgeous copy which appears unread! Selling quality books for 35 years!. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: New. Limited Edition. VERY FINE GUARANTEED. As New (Sealed). The condition is of the highest quality without any discernible flaws. Lifetime Guarantee of Signature Authenticity. Personally hand SIGNED by the author directly into the book. The autograph is not a facsimile, stamp, or auto-pen. Personally hand signed by Nebula Award winner Russell Hoban on a special limitation page. Bound in premium full leather and accented in 22kt gold. Still in the publisher's original shrink wrap, this pristine copy will make a handsome addition to your library. Easton Press. Norwalk, CT. 2010. SIGNED BY AUTHOR. Limited Collector's Edition. A great unique gift for yourself or for a loved one. A luxurious leather bound masterpiece from the Signed First Edition of Science Fiction collection by Easton Press. Beautifully illustrated and bound in full genuine leather. One of the most celebrated works of science fiction literature by a historical writer. A rare signed first edition for the discerning collector. Riddley Walker is a brilliant, unique, completely realized work of fiction. One reads it again and again, discovering new wonders every time through. Set in a remote future in a post-nuclear holocaust England (Inland), Hoban has imagined a humanity regressed to an iron-age, semi-literate state -- and invented a language to represent it. Riddley is at once the Huck Finn and the Stephen Dedalus of his culture -- rebel, change agent, and artist. Read again or for the first time this masterpiece of 20th-century literature with new material by the author. Signed by Author(s).

Original Cloth. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Very Good. Mohan, Mon (illustrator). First Edition. Jill Paton Walsh's copy with her blind stamp to the front free endpaper and the title page. Signed by the author on the title page with a dedication to Nick from RW and Russ Hoban and dated in 1982. The boards have a little rubbing to the bottom corners. small surface nick near the base of the spine. The page edges are slightly browned with a few light spots in places. Very slight marking to the half-title page, three inch creases to the top corners of pages 35 and 195, the top and bottom corners of page 121 and a two inch crease to the top corner of page 201 and a small stain to page 64 but the pages are otherwise clean and unmarked. The jacket has a little fading to the spine and a little light edge wear. Jacket design by Mon Mohan. First printing. Signed by Author(s).

Hardcover. Condition: Like New. No Jacket. Quentin Blake (illustrator). 1st Edition (Thus). Please email for Photographs or further information. Like New - Fine book in fine slipcase. Unread, as new. Beautiful Please see photos as part of condition report 2017 1st Edition (Thus) , Slipcase RIDDLEY WALKER By Russell Hoban Russell Conwell Hoban (February 4, 1925 ? December 13, 2011) was an American expatriate writer. His works span many genres, including fantasy, science fiction, mainstream fiction, magical realism, poetry, and children's books. He lived in London from 1969 until his death. Illustrated By: Quentin Blake Format: Hardcover, Language: English Dust Jacket: No Jacket, Dust Jacket Condition: No Jacket Published By: Folio Society, London folio (fo 12 × 19 305 × 483),Pages 279 ISBN: This edition of Riddley Walker has been typeset in poliphilus and blado types at the Folio Society. The Illustrations have been reproduced by TAG International. It has been printed by Kosel, Krugzell, Germany on woodstock betulla paper and bound by them in Diuchesse offset cloth printed with a design by Quentin Blake. It is limited to 1000 copies, signed and numbered by the artist and 20 lettered copies which are not for sale. Postscript by Dr Rowan Williams, former Archbishop of Canterbury. Riddley Walker is Russell Hoban s genre-defying masterpiece set in post-apocalyptic Kent, in an England in the grip of a second Iron Age, and written in 'Riddleyspeak' a fractured phonetic version of English. This limited edition combines the extraordinary text with large-scale illustrations by Quentin Blake. SKU: BTETM0002019 Approximate Package Dimensions H: 20, L: 35, W: 30 (Units: cm), W: 3Kg. Signed by Illustrator(s).
